Headline: #54 Cicero Temporary Reroute at Cicero/Augusta
ShortDescription: 54 Cicero buses are temporarily rerouted via Cicero, Augusta, Kostner, Division, and Cicero due to, street blockage near Cicero/Augusta.

#54 Cicero buses are temporarily rerouted via Cicero, Augusta, Kostner, Division, and Cicero due to, street blockage near Cicero/Augusta.
